channel.title: Slight problem downloading cache

item.title: Slight problem downloading cache
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

Upload your Cache online, On: Uppit, Dropbox, Mega, Anything that you want, then once uploaded you put your cache link there so it can auto download your cache for the client and users to be able to play once they open the client.
You’re going to want to put your Uploaded Cache link there, in between the " "
Hope this helps, if you need any other help, please reply here.
Thanks & Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Slight problem downloading cache

item.description:
@unknown12313 wrote:

It’s most probably the basic thing you should know, but I do not unfortunately. I need to know how to updatecache.java it doesn’t auto download the cache.

public static final String VERSION_URL = “(what should i put here)”;

Can anyone assist me?
